property.name: objectLabel
property.value: Org Position Restriction

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Information which constrains/describes organization to person relationships of a particular type for an organization. These constraints/descriptions typically involve active relationships.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Org Id

property.name: summary
property.value: Organization the restriction applies to.

property.name: label
property.value: Org Id

property.name: description
property.value: Organization the restriction applies to.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Org Person Relation Type Key

property.name: summary
property.value: Organization to person relationship type the restriction applies to.

property.name: label
property.value: Organization Person Relation Type Key

property.name: description
property.value: Organization to person relationship type the restriction applies to.

property.name: summary
property.value: Title of organization person relationships of this type.

property.name: description
property.value: Title of organization person relationships of this type. This allows for distinction from the name of the relationship type itself, specific for the given organization.

property.name: summary
property.value: Description of the restrictions and use of the relationship type within this particular organization.

property.name: description
property.value: Description of the restrictions and use of the relationship type within this particular organization. This should primarily focus on deviations from the standard use of the relationship type.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Description of the restrictions and use of the relationship type within this particular organization. This should primarily focus on deviations from the standard use of the relationship type.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Std Duration

property.name: summary
property.value: Describes the standard duration of relationships of this type.

property.name: label
property.value: Standard Duration

property.name: description
property.value: Describes the standard duration of relationships of this type.

property.name: objectLabel
property.value: Standard Duration

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Describes the standard duration of relationships of this type.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Atp Duration Type Key

property.name: summary
property.value: The kind of units associated with the quantity, such as Semesters.

property.name: label
property.value: Academic Time Period Duration Type Key

property.name: description
property.value: The kind of units associated with the quantity, such as Semesters.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Time Quantity

property.name: summary
property.value: The amount of time.

property.name: label
property.value: Time Quantity

property.name: description
property.value: The amount of time.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Min Num Relations

property.name: summary
property.value: Acts as a lower bound on the number of relationships of this type expected for the organization.

property.name: label
property.value: Minimum Number of Relations

property.name: description
property.value: Acts as a lower bound on the number of relationships of this type expected for the organization. If specified, this should be less than or equal to the value of maxNumRelations. This number must be greater than or equal to zero.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Max Num Relations

property.name: summary
property.value: Acts as an upper bound on the number of relationships of this type expected for the organization.

property.name: label
property.value: Maximum Number of Relations

property.name: description
property.value: Acts as an upper bound on the number of relationships of this type expected for the organization. The values of this field are restricted to integer values and the string "unbounded". If specified, this should be greater than or equal to the value of minNumRelations, with the value "unbounded" being automatically assumed to be greater.

property.name: summary
property.value: Create and last update info for the structure.

property.name: description
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.
